title: krSNa bArO
sahitya:
krSNa bArO krSNa bArO krSNayya nI bArayya


anupallavi

  saNNa hejjayaniTTu gejje nAdagaLinda


caraNam 1    manmata janakana bEgane bArO kamalApati nI bArO amita 
parAkrama shankara bArO kamanIya gAtrane bArayya doreye
    caraNam 2    kuruLu kEshagaLa oliva anda bharata kastUri tilakada canda 
sirida oppuva navilu kaNgaLinda taratarAbharaNagaLa dharisi nI bArO
    caraNam 3    hAlu beNNegaLa kaiyali koDuva mElAgi bhakSyagaLa mucciTTU taruve 
jAla mADade nI bArayya mariye bAla ena tande purandara viTTala
